channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SAML Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SAML Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21678|2024-08-03T18:23:28.790Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20saml%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SAML Plugin 2.0.7 and earlier allows attackers to craft URLs that would bypass the CSRF protection of any target URL in Jenkins.
